text:
🔥#Chloroquine diphosphate in 2 different dosages for severe #COVID19: Preliminary safety results #RCT
The high dose #CQ arm presented more #QTc>500ms (25%), and a trend toward higher lethality (17%) than the lower dosage

Few numbers but worrying, no?

https://t.co/68e9plLeNE https://t.co/AhoFuX2hYf
